sentences.english: They think little of the difficulties and setbacks on their way forward.
sentences.chinese: 他們對前進道路上的艱難險阻視若等閒。

sentences.english: They encountered untold difficulties and dangers before they reached their destination.
sentences.chinese: 他們經歷過數不盡的艱難險阻纔到達目的地。

sentences.english: Many difficulties and dangers attended upon his single-handed voyage round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他單獨作環球旅行，遇到了許多艱難險阻。

sentences.english: Don't be a quitter at any time, even in face of immense difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 任何時候都不要輕易放棄，即使遇到了艱難險阻。
